meanings.sent1: The enjoyableness of the movie made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the enjoyableness of spending time with friends.
meanings.sent3: The enjoyableness of the party was evident in the laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: Her painting captured the enjoyableness of a sunny day perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The enjoyableness of the music filled the room with happiness.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being enjoyable.
meanings.sent1: We should focus on enhancing the enjoyableness of our activities.
meanings.sent2: The enjoyableness of the vacation was undeniable.
meanings.sent3: The enjoyableness of the situation was a welcome change from the usual routine.
meanings.sent4: The enjoyableness of the book transported me to a different world.
meanings.sent5: The enjoyableness of the food at the restaurant was beyond expectations.
